Code For Selected Patterns
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
{File:BP_RAD.txt  Index:19  Index Date:20120626  PL:84.62%  PS:15.38%  Trades:26  CL:2}

IF CLOSE OF 8 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 6 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 6 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 4 DAYS AGO
THEN BUY NEXT BAR ON THE OPEN WITH
PROFIT TARGET AT ENTRY PRICE + 0.53 %
AND STOP LOSS AT ENTRY PRICE - 1.05 %
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
{File:BP_RAD.txt  Index:19  Index Date:20120625  PL:81.36%  PS:18.64%  Trades:59  CL:3}

IF CLOSE OF 3 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 5 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 2 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 2 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 1 BARS AGO
AND CLOSE OF 1 BARS AGO > CLOSE OF 0 BARS AGO
THEN BUY NEXT BAR ON THE OPEN WITH
PROFIT TARGET AT ENTRY PRICE + 0.53 %
AND STOP LOSS AT ENTRY PRICE - 1.05 %
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
